abstract: The Era brand of detergent uses the image of the actor and martial artist Chuck Norris in a series of tongue-in-cheek spots.
snippet: The Era brand of detergent uses the image of the actor and martial artist Chuck Norris in a series of tongue-in-cheek spots.
lead_paragraph: Chuck Norris: Actor. Martial artist. Internet phenomenon. Supporter of Mike Huckabee. Blurber of “Through My Eyes,” the new autobiography of Tim Tebow. And detergent pitchman?

headline.main: Is This a New ‘Era’ for Detergent Advertising?
headline.print_headline: Is This a New ‘Era’ for Detergent Advertising?
